system.novice: Navigator makes Opposed Willpower Test vs target in range and line of sight. On success deals 1d10 Rending Damage. Damage ignores non-warded armour but not Toughness. Target is automatically knocked prone.
system.adept: Damage increases to 1d10 Rending Damage + 1 per Degree of Success on Opposed Willpower Test.
system.master: Damage increases to 2d10 +  1 per Degree of Success on Opposed Willpower Test. In addition to being knocked down, target is also pinned if they are able to be.

description.value:
Novice: Navigator makes Opposed Willpower Test vs target in range and line of sight. On success deals 1d10 Rending Damage. Damage ignores non-warded armour but not Toughness. Target is automatically knocked prone.

Adept: Damage increases to 1d10 Rending Damage + 1 per Degree of Success on Opposed Willpower Test.

Master: Damage increases to 2d10 + 1 per Degree of Success on Opposed Willpower Test. In addition to being knocked down, target is also pinned if they are able to be.
